Key Match Events: The Chicago Cubs came back from a 10-3 deficit to win 14-10
Post-Match Reflections: Christian Bethancourt had a remarkable performance with three hits and seven RBIs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs have been struggling to finish off opponents, but they finally managed to sweep the Pittsburgh Pirates
Others: The Cubs' backup catcher, Christian Bethancourt, was struggling earlier in the season but has been performing brilliantly since joining the Cubs
